main event: Two witnesses observed a bright white light in the sky near Lemoore, California, which was initially perceived as a stationary object and then appeared to move intermittently over a duration of 5 to 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as looking like a star and was about the size of a pea,The observers noted a bright white light that traveled from the southwest to the northeast,The object was observed at an elevation between approximately 40 and 55 degrees,The conclusion of the report suggested it was likely a satellite (ECHO I),The weather conditions were clear with no unusual activity reported.
